DataElement.preferredName: Residual Disease Central Reviewer Confirmation Quantity Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator related to criteria to determine eligibility of patients related to confirmation of residual tumor by central review.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Residual Disease Central Reviewer Confirmation Quantity Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cancer cells that remain after attempts to remove the cancer have been made._A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data._Having been established or verified._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer cells that remain after attempts to remove the cancer have been made.

Concepts.definition: Tumor cells that remain in the body following cancer treatment.

Property.preferredName: Central Reviewer Confirmation Quantity Eligibility Determination

Concepts.definition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has <=1.5 cm2 maximal cross-s
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has <=1.5 cm2 maximal cross-sectional area of residual tumor been confirmed by rapid central imaging review on APEC14B1?
